esema, wariyapola (wa=wayu, riya=riya, pola=thotupola ) dandumonara guwanthotupolak thibu bawath, mathale yanu dandumonara niyamu mathalige gama bawath, mannarama (manu aa arama ) yanu manu rajathuma pamini thana bawath, aprikawa (apri=apriya wu, ka=kapiriyan) yanu rawana rajathumata apriya wu kapiriyan wa damu dwipaya bawath, ethuma wisin purawidyathmakawa oppu kara atha.

this wasaraka kuriru yuddhaya nima wi uthure nithi paddhathiya sanwardhanaya karanu pinisa aarambha kala palamu usawi sankirnaya kilinochchiye di heta (29) wiwrutha kere.meyata amatharawa uthure nithiya ha samaya sthapitha kirima sandaha idiriye di wawuniyawa, mulathiw, mannarama sthanawala da usawi sankirna aarambha karana bawa eeye (27) pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwakadi adhikarana amathyanshaye lekam janadhipathi nithignya suhada gamlath mahatha pawasiya.yuddhayath samanga winasha wi giya me pradeshaye godanagili nawatha sanwardhanaya kota shri lanka rajaya mangin rajya lanchanaya yatathe ema pradeshaye nithi katayuthu kirimata me adhikaranaya aarambha kala bawa da lekamwaraya pawasiya..

mema pujaniya wasthun athara kirthi shirawa rajasinha rajathuma wisin puja karana lada idikatu hulawa, kadakathiya (dalipihiya* aadiya athulath atapirikara, ranin ha maniken nimawana lada awana, ranmitakin nirmitha chamaraya, ran watapatha, maharan kendiya kuda rankendiya, ranin thanu mini gediya, ranin nimawu sandun heppuwa, kabarosa mala kirthi shiriya rajasinha rajuge maniyan puja kala agana manik allu dalumura thattuwa ha ahalepola adhikarama puja kala mudunata galak badi kendiya, katayam kala ran heppuwa, ranin katayam kala hunu handi, ridi hunu killotaya, ran handun heppuwa, ran kapuru pahan thira, ran patharatuwa, shira , wijaya rajasinha rajuge agamehesiya puja kala ran pathara maya, aadiya athishayin aganeya.

"wimukthita hetak" kiyana themapataya yatathe siduwuna janawari 8 peraliya gana janathawa loku balaporoththu thiyagena inne.dan yana widiyata horu thamanwama allagannath bari na.kalin aapu horuntath galawillak nalune.puduma wenna epa thamantama wiruddhawa horu paminili bara denna yanawa ti wi eke dakkoth.

eka parak poddak ninda gihin aharenakota wahipinnak mawa themala.haki widiyata api okkoma kuda ihala gaththa.pandara wenna wenna sithala dara ganna bari tharam thada unath pirisk widiyata apita eekata muna denna puluwan una.ohoma siddi godak ekka pandara haya withara wenna athi man jiwithe gathakarapu wachanen kiyanna bari paya tika wenna athi ee pandara thune idan haya wenakam.hayata withara lawata bima penna patan gaththa.miduma thada nisa apita mokuth penne na.api haki ikmanata udeta wenkarala thibba aahara kotasa gaththa.glukos saha thawath shakthiya laba dena panayan dekakma ithiriwa thibba nisa kandayama prabodhamath karaganna apita puluwan una.api ee gahatayi ee kala kotasatayi hayayi hathalis paha wenkota aayubowan kiwa.api kadu mudunatama gaman kala.patakaya me thawath nikan adi parwal dige awidagena yana hayik ekak newe api me parwal hoyagenayi yanne parawal dige gihin apitath puluwan kiyanna hayik giya kiyala.
mage ee mel adras eka diyan..
thawaduratath aththe na.
